item.title: Corsair’s PC-dockable screen helped me monitor my PC components and news feeds
item.description: Corsair’s Xeneon Edge is the best at what it does but is software-dependent.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: A New Privacy Phone Arrives, and Samsung Has a $30K 115-Inch Micro RGB TV
item.description: Plus: Ultrahuman’s Ring now tracks ovulation, Nomad Cycles wants to make a fully repairable ebike, and Sling TV has new subscription options.

item.title: Samsung Smart Monitor M9 M90SF Review: The 4K OLED Hybrid
